titleStmt.title: SII 8.44: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 44. (A.R. No. 456 of 1902). ON THE SAME WALL.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . sakalabhuvaṉaccakravattikaḷ śrīAvaṉi Āḷappiṟantārāṉa kopperuñciṅkatevaṟkku yāṇṭu muppattāṟāvatu veṇāṭuṭaiyāṉ Olai . teṉṉavaṉ pirammārāyarum jayatuṅkap pallavaraiyarum tillaiAmpalappallavaraiyarum
Uṭaiyār tirucciṟṟampalamuṭaiyār koyil śrīmāheśvarak kaṇkāṇi ceyvārkaḷum śrīkāriyañ ceyvārkaḷum cāmutāyañceyvārkaḷum koyil ṉāyakañ ceyvārkaḷum tirumāḷikaik kūṟuceyvārkaḷum paṇṭārapottakamuṭai
yārkaḷum kaṇakkarum kaṇṭu viṭutantatāvatu . koyilukkum tirukkāmakkaoṭṭamuṭaiya periyanācciyār koyilukkum tirunantavaṉamum tirunantavaṉappuṟamum tiruOṭaiyum tiruOṭaippuṟamum Āṭiyaruḷa karumpuiṭu viḷākamum pacumañcaḷkāppu ko
llaiyum Ākak kuṉṟapperumāḷnācciyār koṇṭu viṭṭa perumpaṟṟappuliyūr piṭākai mitiṉikkuṭiyāṉa tāṉavinotanallūrilum nallāliyāṉa vikkiramacoḻanallūrilum Erukkāṭṭañceriyāṉa ceyaṅkoṇṭacoḻanallūrilum mitiṉikkuṭiyil tirunilai
Aḻakiyāḷ Eṉṉum tirunāmattāl ceyta tirunantavaṉattukkum tiruOṭaikkum tirunantavaṉappuṟamum tiruOṭaippuṟamum Uṭpaṭṭa nilam muṉṟe Iraṇṭumāk kāṇiyum perumpaṟṟappuliyūr mulaparuṣaiyār Eḻutiṉa mahāsabhāniyoka
ppaṭiye muppattāṟāvatumutal tirunāmattukkāṇiyākavum Iṉṉilattukku varum maṭakku Ūrile Eṟṟikkoḷḷavum . koyilkuṭimai tiruAraṅku virapokam maṭaArici Uḷḷiṭṭaṉa tavirvatākavum . Ippaṭikku vikkaramacoḻaṉ tirumāḷikaiyile kalveṭ
ṭavuṅkaṭavatākap paṇṇuvate . Ivai veṇāṭuṭaiyāṉ Eḻuttu Eṉṟu pukunta Evaṟ tiṭṭiṉpaṭi kal veṭṭiyatu .
Digital edition of SII 8.44 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
